p: MCF-7 and MDA-MB-231 breast cancer cell lines were purchased from American Type Culture Collection (ATCC). The cells were maintained in Roswell Park Memorial Institute (RPMI) 1640 media supplemented with L-glutamine, 1% penicillin-streptomycin, and 10% fetal bovine serum in a humidified atmosphere of 5% carbon dioxide (CO 2) at 37Â°C.
